messages.content: Mike must enter one of the following 3 rooms and survive. First room has armed murderers. Second room has lions that haven't eaten in 10 months. Last room has toxic gas.

Mike should choose the second room with the lions that haven't eaten in 10 months. Lions cannot survive without food for such an extended period, so they would most likely be dead, making the room safe for Mike to enter and survive.
What room should Mike enter and survive and why?

Mike should choose the second room with the lions that haven't eaten in 10 months. Lions cannot survive without food for such an extended period, so they would most likely be dead, making the room safe for Mike to enter and survive. The other two rooms contain immediate dangers (armed murderers and toxic gas) that pose a significant threat to Mike's survival.
